member.name: M:SimaticNET.OPC.DAConnector.Connections.Unique(SimaticNET.OPC.DAConnector.Connections)
member.summary: Returns a wrapper for the specified ensuring that all elements are unique.
member.param: The to wrap.
member.returns: A wrapper around ensuring that all elements are unique.

remarks.para: The Unique wrapper provides a set-like collection by ensuring that all elements in the are unique.
Unique raises an if the specified contains any duplicate elements. The returned wrapper raises a whenever the user attempts to add an element that is already contained in the Connections.

Note: The Unique wrapper reflects any changes made to the underlying , including the possible creation of duplicate elements. The uniqueness of all elements is therefore no longer assured if the underlying collection is manipulated directly.

member.name: M:SimaticNET.OPC.DAConnector.Triggers.Unique(SimaticNET.OPC.DAConnector.Triggers)
member.summary: Returns a wrapper for the specified ensuring that all elements are unique.
member.param: The to wrap.
member.returns: A wrapper around ensuring that all elements are unique.

remarks.para: The Unique wrapper provides a set-like collection by ensuring that all elements in the are unique.
Unique raises an if the specified contains any duplicate elements. The returned wrapper raises a whenever the user attempts to add an element that is already contained in the Triggers.

Note: The Unique wrapper reflects any changes made to the underlying , including the possible creation of duplicate elements. The uniqueness of all elements is therefore no longer assured if the underlying collection is manipulated directly.
